sentences: Ma olen kasutanud seda programmi varem.
Ta on kasutanud oma võimalusi hästi.
Me oleme kasutanud sama meetodit juba mitu korda.
context: The word 'kasutanud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'kasutada', which means 'to use'. It describes something that has been used or utilized in the past. This form would typically appear in perfect tense constructions in Estonian.
